channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiDeceptor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiDeceptor

item.title: CVE-2022-27487|2024-08-03T05:32:57.807Z -- fortinet -- fortideceptor
item.description: A improper privilege management in Fortinet FortiSandbox version 4.2.0 through 4.2.2, 4.0.0 through 4.0.2 and before 3.2.3 and FortiDeceptor version 4.1.0, 4.0.0 through 4.0.2 and before 3.3.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to perform unauthorized API calls via crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests.
